oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Entwicklung eines regionalen Ausbildungsmodells „Ökolandbau und Vermarktung“ an der Fachhochschule Eberswalde im Rahmen des Bundesförderprogramms Regionen Aktiv
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bloch, R.
Häring, A.
Krieger, A.-E.
Schatz, T.
Schmidt, R.
Piorr, H.-P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In September 2004 a new B. Sc. study course for Organic Farming and Marketing started at the University of Applied Sciences Eberswalde. Supported by the Federal Ministry of Consumer Protection, Food and Agriculture program “Regionen Aktiv” an innovative education model was established. Focussing on rural development farmers, processors and trading partners were involved in the development of topics for the study programme.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bloch, R.; Häring, A.; Krieger, A.-E.; Schatz, T.; Schmidt, R. and Piorr, H.-P. (2005) Entwicklung eines regionalen Ausbildungsmodells „Ökolandbau und Vermarktung“ an der Fachhochschule Eberswalde im Rahmen des Bundesförderprogramms Regionen Aktiv. [Development of a regional education course model “Organic Farming and Marketing” at the University of Applied Sciences Eberswalde in the frame of the support scheme Regionen Aktiv.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
